  2. #include "cspec/config.h"
  3. #include "cspec/core.h"
  4. #include "skip_list.h"


  7. DESCRIBE(EmptySkipList, "Empty skip list")

  9. ‌    SkipSet* ss = make_skipset();

  11.     IT( "has a count of 0" )
  12.         SHOULD_EQUAL(count(ss), 0)
  13.     END_IT

  15.     IT( "does not contain any value" )
  16.         SHOULD_EQUAL(contains(ss, 0), 0)
  17.         SHOULD_EQUAL(contains(ss, 1), 0)
  18.         SHOULD_EQUAL(contains(ss, 2), 0)
  19.         SHOULD_EQUAL(contains(ss, -1), 0)
  20.     END_IT

  22.     IT( "fails when deleting nodes" )
  23.         SHOULD_EQUAL(delete(ss, 0), 0)
  24.         SHOULD_EQUAL(delete(ss, 2), 0)
  25.         SHOULD_EQUAL(delete(ss, 5), 0)
  26.     END_IT

  28.     delete_skipset(ss);

  30. END_DESCRIBE


  33. DESCRIBE(SkipListCount, "count")

  35. ‌    SkipSet* ss = make_skipset();

  37.     IT( "returns 0 when the list is empty" )
  38.         SHOULD_EQUAL(count(ss), 0)
  39.     END_IT

  41.     IT( "returns 1 when one element has been inserted" )
  42.         insert(ss, 0);
  43.         SHOULD_EQUAL(count(ss), 1)
  44.     END_IT

  46.     IT( "returns the number of different elements" )
  47.         insert(ss, 1);
  48.         insert(ss, 2);
  49.         insert(ss, 0);
  50.         SHOULD_EQUAL(count(ss), 3)
  51.     END_IT

  53.     delete_skipset(ss);

  55. END_DESCRIBE

  57. DESCRIBE(SkipListInsert, "insert")

  59. ‌    SkipSet* ss = make_skipset();

  61.     IT( "returns 1 when insertion is successful" )
  62.         SHOULD_EQUAL( insert(ss, 0), 1)
  63.     END_IT

  65.     IT( "returns 0 when insertion failed (item already in the list)" )
  66.         insert(ss, 255);
  67.         SHOULD_EQUAL( insert(ss, 255), 0)

  69.         SHOULD_PENDING("check with a more complex list (several levels)")
  70.     END_IT

  72.     delete_skipset(ss);

  74. END_DESCRIBE

  76. DESCRIBE(SkipListContains, "contains")

  78. ‌    SkipSet* ss = make_skipset();

  80.     IT( "returns 1 when the item is found" )
  81.         insert(ss, 45);
  82.         SHOULD_EQUAL( contains(ss, 45), 1)
  83.     END_IT

  85.     IT( "returns 0 when the item is not found" )
  86.         SHOULD_EQUAL( contains(ss, -45), 0)
  87.     END_IT

  89.     delete_skipset(ss);

  91. END_DESCRIBE

  93. DESCRIBE(SkipListDelete, "delete")

  95. ‌    SkipSet* ss = make_skipset();

  97.     IT( "returns 1 when the item is successfully deleted" )
  98.         insert(ss, 45);
  99.         SHOULD_EQUAL( delete(ss, 45), 1)
  100.     END_IT

  102.     IT( "returns 0 when the item is not found" )
  103.         SHOULD_EQUAL( delete(ss, 45), 0)
  104.     END_IT

  106.     delete_skipset(ss);

  108. END_DESCRIBE
